Daniel John Bongino is an American conservative political commentator, radio show host, and author. 
[[File:Dan Bongino.webp|thumb|411x411px|Dan Bongino]]
He served as a 

* New York City Police Department officer from 1995 to 1999 
* Secret Service agent from 1999 to 2011 

Bongino ran for Congress unsuccessfully as a Republican three times.

In Episode #343 Alex confuses Dan Bongino with the Secret Service Agent/Reptoid of conspiract theory
